action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of colored shapes arranged in a specific pattern. There are green, purple, and orange shapes, along with a pink shape. The green shapes are on the left and right sides, the purple shape is in the center, and the orange and pink shapes are on the right side. The shapes are arranged in a way that resembles a combination of letters and symbols.

Now, please provide your description and we can start asking questions.
continue
